      • getHint

        protected static String getHint(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                String mediaType)
        Method to get the hint to display in case module monitoring levels are OFF
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - the uri context object of the input request
        mediaType - the media type of the input request
        Returns:
        a hit to display when module monitoring levels are all OFF
